name: Cat Evolution Clicker
description:
The evolution of cats begins!
Merge a couple of simple cats to get new species! Cat clicker game from creators of Cats Go!
Turn two cats into new super cat with just one click! Extraordinary cats evolve - just click on the same kittens to merge them!
Help cat open evolution – unlock different kinds of felines to gather the full cat collection!Space cat, orange cat, space kitty, panda cat, cat-meme, space kitten, alien cat, sushi cat, stalker cat, flying cat, fishy cat, street cat, and other monster cats are waiting!
Drag and drop one similar cat to another, so that they evolve and upgrade, and bring more money to different boosters of your gameplay!
Watch the cat evolution and sent cat into space with our game!
